titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: HARS MESSAGE VERSION IDENTIFIER - Description

div.p: HARS MESSAGE VERSION IDENTIFIER is the same as attribute DATA SET VERSION NUMBER.
The HARS MESSAGE VERSION IDENTIFIER identifies the version number of the HIV and AIDS Reporting Data Set XML Schema which is being used to submit data to Public Health England (PHE).

The HARS MESSAGE VERSION IDENTIFIER must be populated for each record, in the HARS Submission Identifier group within the HIV and AIDS Reporting Data Set XML Schema, by the sender of the data set submission prior to transmission of the data to Public Health England.
